name: LearnArtHistory
0:
”Alexa, open Art History”
”Alexa, start Art History”
”Alexa, ask Art History for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art history
des: Learn more about art history! With this skill you can get general facts as well as more specific lesser known information. The skill is full of information about Roman and Greek Art but will soon expand to include all areas of Art History. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
